content: I am seeing problems with both JIRA and Confluence. Really slow, and can't seem to login.
@Eric Schmitt crowdfree.hl7.org is down, and Jira is unusable

The way this issue presents itself is causing a bit of a mess in that people are resetting their passwords for nought. The landing page is accessible but people trying to log on are getting system feedback that their crendentials our wrong .. it's only when you reset your password that you get feedback crowdfree.hl7.org is down.
yes it's a disaster, that's for sure
@Joshua Procious has been alerted and is looking in to it
